desc.de: Traditionelle rote Currypaste mit Kokosmilch, Hühnerfleisch, Gemüse, Limettengras, Thai Basilikum, dazu Jasminreis. (Leicht scharf)
desc.en: Traditional red curry paste with coconut milk, chicken, vegetables, lemongrass, Thai basil, served with jasmine rice. (Mildly spicy)
desc.tr: Hindistan cevizi sütü, tavuk eti, sebzeler, limon otu, Tayland fesleğeni ve yasemin pirinci ile geleneksel kırmızı köri ezmesi. (Hafif acı)
desc.es: Pasta de curry rojo tradicional con leche de coco, carne de pollo, verduras, limoncillo, albahaca tailandesa, servida con arroz jazmín. (Ligeramente picante)

desc.de: Typisches Streetfood, würziges Rinderfaschiertes aus dem Wok mit Königsbasilikum, Gemüse, Chili und Spiegelei, dazu Jasminreis.
desc.en: Typical street food, spicy minced beef from the wok with king basil, vegetables, chili and fried egg, served with jasmine rice.
desc.tr: Tipik sokak lezzeti, kral fesleğeni, sebzeler, biber ve sahanda yumurta ile wokta pişirilmiş baharatlı dana kıyma, yasemin pirinci ile servis edilir.
desc.es: Comida callejera típica, carne picada de ternera picante al wok con albahaca real, verduras, chile y huevo frito, acompañada de arroz jazmín.

desc.de: Süß-würzige Hühnerstreifen aus dem Wok mit Königsbasilikum, Gemüse und dazu Jasminreis.
desc.en: Sweet and savory chicken strips from the wok with king basil, vegetables and jasmine rice.
desc.tr: Kral fesleğeni, sebzeler ve yasemin pirinci ile wokta pişirilmiş tatlı-baharatlı tavuk şeritleri.
desc.es: Tiras de pollo dulces y picantes al wok con albahaca real, verduras y arroz jazmín.

desc.de: Herzhaftes indisches Curry mit Hühnerfleisch in cremiger Tomaten-Butter-Sahne-Sauce, serviert mit Roti und Jasminreis.
desc.en: Hearty Indian curry with chicken in a creamy tomato-butter-cream sauce, served with roti and jasmine rice.
desc.tr: Kremalı domatesli tereyağlı sos içinde tavuk etli doyurucu Hint körisi, Roti ve yasemin pirinci ile servis edilir.
desc.es: Curry indio contundente con pollo en una cremosa salsa de tomate, mantequilla y nata, servido con roti y arroz jazmín.

desc.de: 2 Stk. Handgemachte Frühlingsrollen gefüllt mit Rind, Glasnudeln und Gemüse. (Vegan möglich)
desc.en: 2 pcs. Handmade spring rolls filled with beef, glass noodles and vegetables. (Vegan option available)
desc.tr: 2 adet. Dana eti, cam erişte ve sebze ile doldurulmuş el yapımı bahar ruloları. (Vegan seçenek mevcuttur)
desc.es: 2 uds. Rollitos de primavera hechos a mano rellenos de ternera, fideos de cristal y verduras. (Opción vegana disponible)

desc.en: For those who like it extra hot!
desc.es: ¡Para los que les gusta extra picante!
